feed.title: Redirecterr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Redirecterr: 0.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added logs for metadata by @varthe in https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/pull/8

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/compare/0.1.2...0.1.3

entry.title: New release for Redirecterr: 0.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Default overseerr behaviour on no match by @varthe in https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/pull/10

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/compare/0.1.3...0.1.4

entry.title: New release for Redirecterr: 1.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ability to filter by 4k/non-4k only by @varthe in https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/pull/11

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/compare/0.1.4...1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Redirecterr: 2.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add "require" option and beta image publish workflow by @varthe in https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/pull/15
  • Update publish-image.yaml by @varthe in https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/pull/17
  • Typescript rewrite + max_seasons field by @varthe in https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/pull/18

Full Changelog: https://github.com/varthe/Redirecterr/compare/1.0.1...2.0.0
